      • setState

        public void setState(boolean state)

      • fire

        public boolean fire()
             throws SignalInvalidException
        Description copied from class: Fireable
        is called by jPac in every cycle to check, if the fire condition occured the fire condition must be true for at least one call. on occurrence it is latched by the Fireable, until it is processed. Must not be called by the application directly.
        Specified by:
        fire in class Fireable
        Returns:
        true, if the fire condition occured
        Throws:
        SignalInvalidException

        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
